name: Saira Condensed
description: Saira is a sans serif system. It features a huge range of weights and widths, ready for all kind of typographic challenges. This is the Condensed family, which is part of the superfamily along with Normal , Semi Condensed , and Extra Condensed , each with 9 weights. This typeface was designed by Hector Gatti and developed by the Omnibus Type team. To contribute to the project, visit github.com/Omnibus-Type
author: Omnibus-Type
